original: 曹魏後期猛將。姜維四次北伐時，從陳泰迎戰蜀軍。姜維弟七次北伐，於狄道殺死蜀軍大將張嶷。但卻因守狄道的同僚李簡投降，無路可退而兵敗戰死。
text: Cao Wei's late fierce general. During the four Northern Expeditions, Jiang Wei fought against the Shu army from Chen Tai. Jiang Weidi made seven northern expeditions, and Yu Didao killed the Shu army general Zhang Yi. But because of Didao's colleague Li Jian surrendered, there was no way to retreat and was defeated and died.
